releaseNotes: - Added FlingRecyclerView.kt with fling speed, divide, and threshold constants in Constants.kt, FlingRecyclerView.kt lets you zOoooom through chapters
- NovelUI.kt identifier is always a certain negative
- Moved share button to top in NovelController.kt
- Known issue with crashing on opening a novel, the issue is being worked on
- Filter option not yet added for chapters
